alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Ozark; Stone; Taney (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 11:30PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WESTERN OZARK...SOUTHWESTERN DOUGLAS...TANEY...SOUTHEASTERN CHRISTIAN AND SOUTHEASTERN STONE COUNTIES THROUGH MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1129 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles south of Sparta to Hollister to near Roberson Hollow. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Branson, Lake Taneycomo, Table Rock State Park, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Bull Shoals Lake, Table Rock Lake, Hollister, Silver Dollar City, Forsyth, Merriam Woods, Kissee Mills, Rockaway Beach, Bull Creek, Indian Point, Branson West, Taneyville, Table Rock, Theodosia, Kirbyville and Blue Eye. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for southwestern Missouri.
